660387001.name: Amy
660387001.author: a TripAdvisor user
660387001.reviewBody: If you visit Guadalajara going on a tour to Tlalquepaque is a must. You find all sort of memoirs to bring back home to your friends and family

657284064.name: If shopping is your thing...
657284064.author: a TripAdvisor user
657284064.reviewBody: My wife liked it more than me.  Tlaquepaque is much prettier than Tonala, and also has the ceramic museums.  It is a ways from downtown, and worth a vist maybe once...

653968295.name: Tlaquepaque markets
653968295.author: a TripAdvisor user
653968295.reviewBody: Fun place to stroll and snack lots of vendors, a mix of traditional and china made goods, little market for fruit etc.

651736205.name: Artist haven
651736205.author: a TripAdvisor user
651736205.reviewBody: Tlaquepaque is one of my favorite places and has art worth a visit. A lovely small town just outside of Guadelajara.\n

675686827.name: Visually stunning
675686827.author: a TripAdvisor user
675686827.reviewBody: As you can expect from any Catholic Church, the architecture here is actually stunning & intricate. Please note you have to be extremely quiet when you enter. You can expect to see mannequins of various people from the Bible including Jesus in a glass coffin. Somewhat eerie but expected in Catholic Churches

675123521.name: Beautiful
675123521.author: a TripAdvisor user
675123521.reviewBody: While on the walking tour we visited the cathedral it\u2019s preserved and beautiful. A must see. Beware of the homeless people that dwell outside of the entrance

673500172.name: Very impressive
673500172.author: a TripAdvisor user
673500172.reviewBody: This cathedral is very impressive even if we didn\'t see the Murillo\'s frescos. The place is imense and with a beautiful architecture.

670322374.name: Can\'t Be Missed.  Center Point Of Guadalajara.
670322374.author: a TripAdvisor user
670322374.reviewBody: One of many beautiful churches of Guadalajara.  Every Church one sees in this city is worth taking a look inside.  This one is definitely no exception.

669992990.name: History. Spirituality. Culture
669992990.author: a TripAdvisor user
669992990.reviewBody: The blend of many styles of this incredible Cathedral is well worth the visit. I was there for the Semana Santa (Holy Week) and every service made this place of worship alive and spiritually uplifting. Some incredible, personal and unforgettable moments!

669928949.name: Such beauty . . .
669928949.author: a TripAdvisor user
669928949.reviewBody: In just under 40 years between visits the cathedral has barely changed, but as it was Easter it was extremely busy, full bells at noon on Easter Sunday was a thrill and very emotional for us ~

669515658.name: Nice cathedral
669515658.author: a TripAdvisor user
669515658.reviewBody: Located in a plaza of Guadalajara...surrounded by vendors and people sitting on benches...watching people go by...not a very big Cathedral...neither a flashy one...it is built in the Spanish renaissance style except it\u2019s neo gothic spires...it was built in 1541 and is a Roman Catholic cathedral

669270866.name: Impressive Cathedral
669270866.author: a TripAdvisor user
669270866.reviewBody: Really enjoyed my time touring the area and this cathedral was simply amazing, I didn\'t get to go Inside and unsure if its open for the public but totally worth seeing.

669218121.name: An amazing cathedral and square right in the middle of Guadalajara Centro!
669218121.author: a TripAdvisor user
669218121.reviewBody: This cathedral is an amazing sight to behold, both for its history and architectural beauty. The cathedral is right in the center of a massive square, which was the heart of Guadalajara. The square has a very large fountain and gazebo as well as all number of activities. When we arrived, there was a band playing here. This was surely a gathering point of culture in the capital city of the Mexican state of Jalisco.

668695018.name: Amazing tower
668695018.author: a TripAdvisor user
668695018.reviewBody: You can see this massive structure from far away and it is a beautiful building with historic and modern components of the building. It is like the Eiffel tower of Guadalajara.

667955579.name: Well located
667955579.author: a TripAdvisor user
667955579.reviewBody: The best thing, for me, is the location, I mean, it\u2019s architecture is awesome and it\u2019s quite important, but its location is the best part, because is right in the middle of everything, and the square right in front is great, and the markets, and the ruins!

666530492.name: Beautiful building with spectacular detail
666530492.author: a TripAdvisor user
666530492.reviewBody: This place feels special, the architecture is amazing and the beautiful stained glass windows are spectacular when the sun is shining.

666104682.name: Incredible place
666104682.author: a TripAdvisor user
666104682.reviewBody: We take our tour groups here everytrip into the city. I always wonder how they created such beautiful design. It\'s a must see

664333073.name: Guadalajara highlight
664333073.author: a TripAdvisor user
664333073.reviewBody: If in el centro de Guadalajara, you must visit the cathedral. It\'s a fine piece of architecture and a place to pray if that\'s your thang. It\'s well lit at night. I would say it is the centerpiece of the centro historico.

662782412.name: Worth seeing
662782412.author: a TripAdvisor user
662782412.reviewBody: This Cathedral and the Chapel next door is beautiful with beautiful works of art and a magnificent alter.\nIt is well worth a visitor while in Guadalajara.

661747870.name: Rich in culture
661747870.author: a TripAdvisor user
661747870.reviewBody: Beautiful site!!! Lots to see inside and outside the Cathedral. Very central location close to other sites and local places to eat.

660960130.name: Amazing!
660960130.author: a TripAdvisor user
660960130.reviewBody: This huge cathedral impresses everyone who passes its doors.  Stunning architectural detail and splendour.  Peaceful to its worshippers.

659736939.name: The oldest cathedral in mexico
659736939.author: a TripAdvisor user
659736939.reviewBody: This cathedral is pretty, but not so fancy as many cathedrals are in Mexico.  There are secret tunnels under the cathedral that lead to all the churches in the area, but they are closed off for use now.  Worth a quick visit.

659521889.name: Old colonial Spanish art
659521889.author: a TripAdvisor user
659521889.reviewBody: A nice building, very similar to many of the churches you can find in Mexico and in Latin America. Worth visit.

658820757.name: Ethereal!!
658820757.author: a TripAdvisor user
658820757.reviewBody: Breathtaking! A must see!  Full of history in every corner. Loved that we heard a real sermon versus money money like at our church.

658743345.name: Beautiful
658743345.author: a TripAdvisor user
658743345.reviewBody: One of many beautiful historical sites in Guadalajara.  I very much enjoyed my visit here. You will not be disappointed!

658506354.name: Ranks Right Up There with the Cathedrals of Europe
658506354.author: a TripAdvisor user
658506354.reviewBody: It\'s very nice.  I\'d recommend taking a guided tour as there\'re quite a few hidden nooks for the exploring and that do well with explanation as there is no informational signage at all.  As far as cathedrals go, it was right up there with the best of them.

657474313.name: A stunning piece of architecture
657474313.author: a TripAdvisor user
657474313.reviewBody: A visit to Guadalajara isn\'t complete without a visit to the cathedral in the central district. A stunning work of architecture, even the non-religious will be awed. Be sure to step down into the crypt if it is open. Take time to look at the artwork all around, and be sure to explore the outside of the building as well.

657445976.name: Impressive cathedral
657445976.author: a TripAdvisor user
657445976.reviewBody: This cathedral was impressive inside and out with its twin golden spires and its beautiful stained glass windows.  Awe inspiring!

657284201.name: Impressive cathedral amongst many
657284201.author: a TripAdvisor user
657284201.reviewBody: Yes, very impressive but surrounded by many other impressive iglesias...  It is the hub of El Centro and surrounded by at least three very nice plazas.  All in all, part of a must-see of the historic center of Guadaljara.

654571035.name: Ground central in the historico district
654571035.author: a TripAdvisor user
654571035.reviewBody: We were in the church twice during our visit and it is important to see it at different times from the natural lighting perspective. Enjoy the beautiful white interior inside.

653695361.name: Speaks for itself, amazing
653695361.author: a TripAdvisor user
653695361.reviewBody: This is the must-see attraction in GDL.  Awe inspiring to see in person and the inside is just as beautiful.  Only CDMX has a more impressive cathedral in the western hemisphere.

653090393.name: Must see this church
653090393.author: a TripAdvisor user
653090393.reviewBody: Find the museum, it has artifacts and some history items. You can also watch artists, reconditioning items. You cant take pictures, but on the roof top we took some of the city views. Then go to the main part of the cathedral. Absolutely amazing

652246016.name: A must see in Guadalajara!
652246016.author: a TripAdvisor user
652246016.reviewBody: This cathedral is impressive and was built by locals! It is surrounded by small shops and restaurants. All kinds of interesting people from all over the world come to the Cathedra. Viva Mexico!

649226730.name: Incredibly beautiful Structure
649226730.author: a TripAdvisor user
649226730.reviewBody:
Love this cathedral a beautiful experience morning noon and night 
the architecture is absolutely fantastic it’s hard not to feel the presence of God .

647435836.name: Amazing Cathedral
647435836.author: a TripAdvisor user
647435836.reviewBody: The whole cathedral is majestic, inside and outside.  All the surroundings are incredible. This zone of Guadalajara is a must.

647056257.name: Breath Taking
647056257.author: a TripAdvisor user
647056257.reviewBody: As. I entered the Cathedral a service was going on. People quietly wandered around and viewed the beauty of the cathedral

646210544.name: Historic Church
646210544.author: a TripAdvisor user
646210544.reviewBody: We stoppyon our tour to see this church. It is huge and built back in 1600\u2019s. Beautiful stained glass windows. Lots of gold and colors. We got to go down below into the crypt to see where there head priests were buried. Also high ranking city officials and church members were buried in the church. Enjoyed the pageantry and the ornate decorations. 10 to 15 minutes gives you enough time for a quick visit

645635224.name: Beautiful!!!!
645635224.author: a TripAdvisor user
645635224.reviewBody: What a spectacular church.  The architecture and surrounding plazas are beautiful.  The inside is just as wonderful.

645583846.name: incre\u00edble mercado con hermosa arquitectura
645583846.author: a TripAdvisor user
645583846.reviewBody: Such an amazing place. I am not one that is usually taken back by architecture but this place is amazing! When others have described this place to me they have not said anything about the market place (mercado) that surrounds the area. It is an amazing experience and I hope everyone gets a chance to go here in their lifetime.

644179030.name: What a building in and out
644179030.author: a TripAdvisor user
644179030.reviewBody: I visited the Guadalajara Cathedral on my Expedia Guided Tour of GDL & Tiaquepaque on Wednesday Morning December 26 2018.This may be possibly the most impressive Church i\'ve ever been in and I include ones in Costa Rica and Havana Cuba on that list.One of the things that\'s most interesting and surprising is that it was designed by an Italian so it doesn\'t look most Churches in Latin America & The Caribbean.If you\'re in Guadalajara and want to check out some interesting spots and architecture to see then I\'d say check out The Guadalajara Cathedral.

643965236.name: Beautiful cathedral!
643965236.author: a TripAdvisor user
643965236.reviewBody: This cathedral is one of the most beautiful I\'ve seen in Mexico and Latin America.  Rising above the plaza in front, the church upon entering is immense.  The high altar is gorgeous with rococo, gold, and statues, completes the massive architectural design.  I walked around during a mass.  The sound of the choir, the priest and the faithful made the visit that much more inspiring.  A definite place to visit during your stay in Guadalajara.

643883551.name: Beautiful cathedral!
643883551.author: a TripAdvisor user
643883551.reviewBody: We visited here in December it was beautiful. The main cathedral was closed to the public but there was a smaller church we could enter.\n\nWe would recommend.

643868631.name: Gorgeous colonial cathedral
643868631.author: a TripAdvisor user
643868631.reviewBody: Guadalajara is a city of churches and the cathedral is perhaps the most beautiful of them all.  Central to the city with plazas on all sides, it is the heartbeat of Guadalajara.  Shopping is convenient and the cafes on the plaza are a wonderful place to start your day.\n

642664666.name: Amazing
642664666.author: a TripAdvisor user
642664666.reviewBody: This is one amazing Cathedral.  The space is massive and beautifully decorated.  Worth it to spend a little time exploring.

642644056.name: church nearby to go to christmas mass
642644056.author: a TripAdvisor user
642644056.reviewBody: Stayed at the NH Hotel which was only a couple blocks away.\nDue not that there is subway construction- not visible.\nChurch is beautiful but be aware that people (homeless or what not) sleep on the steps of the Cathedral.

642111185.name: Cathedral visit for prayer
642111185.author: a TripAdvisor user
642111185.reviewBody: Always a pleasure visiting Mexico\u2019s Cathedrals.   Ask to go see the crypts where the archbishops were laid to rest.   We decided to stop to light a candle for some of our family members.   We discovered that they do not let you light candle any longer and leave them as religious offering.  We were told it is bc the wax is hard to remove.

641958939.name: Beautiful
641958939.author: a TripAdvisor user
641958939.reviewBody: This is a beautiful Cathedral a must visit if you are in the city.  The architecture is outstanding!   The next time I visit I would like to stay in a hotel nearby and visit all the historic buildings.

641193349.name: Old and pretty
641193349.author: a TripAdvisor user
641193349.reviewBody: Really beautiful construction, I think it\'s a spanish renaissance style. It is a very old. It is a good plan to take photos and to know it during a walk there.

639969325.name: Cathedral
639969325.author: a TripAdvisor user
639969325.reviewBody: Located in the Centro historico square in Guadalajara. This cathedral is the cream of the crop a jd and that\'s saying something because there are tonnes of architectural beauties in Guadalajara. Doors are open everyday so go in and have a walk around. Go downstairs to the crypts of Catholic bishops, archbishop\'s and other famous Catholic people.\nView priceless artwork and the famous  mummy girl. Cost is free.

638898002.name: Beautiful cathedral, nice place to rest
638898002.author: a TripAdvisor user
638898002.reviewBody: In relation to other cathedrals in the world, this one isn\u2019t that impressive but it\u2019s still worth a visit. Entrance is free and visited by locals and tourists alike. Inside is cool and have seats so you can pray, contemplate on life, or just take a break from the heat outside. Don\u2019t forget to leave a donation at the door to support the church.

635505627.name: Beautiful church
635505627.author: a TripAdvisor user
635505627.reviewBody: This is one of the if not the biggest church in Guadalajara. I love the saints sculptures around the church and its structure. Beautiful building, colonial style and well taken care of.

635488715.name: A cathedral unique in Mexico
635488715.author: a TripAdvisor user
635488715.reviewBody: The Guadalajara Cathedral is a broad open space without the central coro that blocks the view of many old cathedrals. The exterior style is a mixture of colonial and neo-classic elements, but is very harmonious. The interior is wonderfully light and rococo in decoration. The interior has a superb collection of windows and sculptures. The overall impact is amazing. But go for the noon Mass on Sunday and hear the singers of the choir - one of the better cathedral choirs in Mexico. The large gallery organ is also used for prelude and postlude, a grand effect.

633478359.name: A jewel in the Crown
633478359.author: a TripAdvisor user
633478359.reviewBody: This cathedral is a must on any trip to Guadalajara. It is an archeological treasure and is filled with history. The interior is easily one of the best and contains several reliquaries and even a catacomb under the altar.

633239220.name: Don\'t miss the History
633239220.author: a TripAdvisor user
633239220.reviewBody: We took a night stroll, lighting on the cathedral is beautiful and the back park is shared with the Degollado theatre.  Well worth visiting,

624711743.name: Absolutely beautiful
624711743.author: a TripAdvisor user
624711743.reviewBody: When you visit this cathedral, you know you\u2019ve been to church. This space is so conducive to prayer!!!

621793321.name: History, architecture, local life
621793321.author: a TripAdvisor user
621793321.reviewBody: mexico, beside very friendly people and good beers, they have history to offer, come to this big city and see how they save historical places, unless like some other nations

621327886.name: Nice Views
621327886.author: a TripAdvisor user
621327886.reviewBody: The place is in center of GDL and provides nice views. It\'s one of the tourist attraction in GDL and you will find a mix of tourist and locals visiting this place. Locals perform dance on the streets near the campus and fountain area.

620037738.name: Forgettable
620037738.author: a TripAdvisor user
620037738.reviewBody: Maybe I\'ve just been to too many cathedrals, but there was nothing special or outstanding about the one facing Guadalajara\'s HUGE main square. At least visiting cathedrals is free.

618298845.name: Impressive
618298845.author: a TripAdvisor user
618298845.reviewBody: Impressive building. Don\'t miss the crypt under the altar. The building however feels smaller from inside than it looks on the outside.

613267970.name: Beautiful
613267970.author: a TripAdvisor user
613267970.reviewBody: It is a beautiful Cathedral, I recomend visiting on October 12, on this day every year, our lady of Zapopan is taken on a  procesion to her home, the Zapopan Basilica, meanwhile there are food stands, games, musical and cultural activies all around the Cathedral.

612347283.name: great family atmosphere
612347283.author: a TripAdvisor user
612347283.reviewBody: best place to spend time with the family, listen to music, sit around, have a snack, beer, or dinner. Tons of families do the same every weekend. Great architecture if you want to get pictures.

609026956.name: Incredible - Especially at Dusk-Night!!!
609026956.author: a TripAdvisor user
609026956.reviewBody: Simply one of the most gorgeous architectural structures on EARTH!!! PERIOD!!! Go visit early evening or evening to enjoy the incredible illumination in the square adjacent to this gorgeous structure.

608897612.name: A Really Classical Place
608897612.author: a TripAdvisor user
608897612.reviewBody: As i am not religious, my visit was solely for historical and architectural pleasure. The cathedral includes a nice plaza out front, a really cool old world vibe, and some really brilliant artwork.

608657635.name: Amazing Architecture, Gothic Design, Breathtaking Interior
608657635.author: a TripAdvisor user
608657635.reviewBody: This cathedral was originally built in the 1500\'s and stands majestically in the center of Guadalajara. During the day, there is a sudden hush when walking in from the big main plaza, giving you the feeling of awe and quiet reflection. Overhead is the dizzying loftiness of the arched ceiling which gracefully reaches down to the beautiful stained glass windows. Take your time to leisurely stroll past the many sculptures of saints and several altars, all intricately designed.\n\nIf you think this Cathedral is amazing during the day, you have got to see it in the evening when it\'s all lit up! We went to see it during the annual Light Festival, and it was SPECTACULAR!

603659187.name: A most see
603659187.author: a TripAdvisor user
603659187.reviewBody: Very beautiful church. Very well kept\nAll the surroundings are very beautiful, most visit if you go to Guadalajara. Plenty of typical restaurants around, very moderately priced.

603622783.name: Beautiful
603622783.author: a TripAdvisor user
603622783.reviewBody: This place is beautiful inside and out ! One of the main attractions to visit if you\u2019re ever  in Guadalajara.  There are vendors located outside on the sides of the church for some souvenirs. Located at the center of other museums.

597429468.name: Guadalajara cathedral
597429468.author: a TripAdvisor user
597429468.reviewBody: It was very beautiful inside and outside. The stain glass windows were absolutely incredible. Very worth going to see.

596387322.name: Beautiful architecture!!!
596387322.author: a TripAdvisor user
596387322.reviewBody: It is awesome that this architectural buildings still exist. It is located in the central part of Guadalajara!! Just beautiful!!

595974055.name: One of the many beauties in Guadalajara center
595974055.author: a TripAdvisor user
595974055.reviewBody: This majestic church matches many other structures in the historic center of Guadalajara. Beautiful and massive both outside and inside, it\'s worth taking the time to look around. You shouldn\'t skip it.

594435865.name: A must see
594435865.author: a TripAdvisor user
594435865.reviewBody: The Cathedral was spectacular but what was really something was the surrounding area. Lots to see and music everywhere. We spent the entire day, exploring all the other churches and museums. We stayed at the Historical Hotel Morales so we were in walking distance of everything including great restaurants.

591941459.name: Nice place
591941459.author: a TripAdvisor user
591941459.reviewBody:
Nice cathedral 
The place around is very nice also
All the area of the historical center worth a visit 
There are also small chapels around

591911897.name: A must if you are in Guadalajara
591911897.author: a TripAdvisor user
591911897.reviewBody: There is almost one in every major city across Latin America but this one is unique in it architecture. Recommended

588681893.name: Must see
588681893.author: a TripAdvisor user
588681893.reviewBody: Absolutely beautiful church that is a must see when visiting gdl at least if you\u2019ve never seen it before. Great start to the dt tour!

588634224.name: Cathedral
588634224.author: a TripAdvisor user
588634224.reviewBody: I don\u00b4t thing there is anything special about this cathedral. It is well kept. There was a mass when we walked in so we were not free to move around and see the whole place from the inside.

587418877.name: Very nice ambiance
587418877.author: a TripAdvisor user
587418877.reviewBody: That area is a must see, be prepared to take lots of pictures.There are several other historical sites in the immediate vicinity.

584674638.name: Beautiful
584674638.author: a TripAdvisor user
584674638.reviewBody: Each Cathedral in Guadalajara is worth a visit. They are each different but beautiful. This one is the most popular.

583199632.name: Hopefully Soon
583199632.author: a TripAdvisor user
583199632.reviewBody: The reason why a named the title \u201cHopefully Soon\u201d is because hopefully once the construction is completed you would be able to enjoy the visit to the Cathedral as of today May 24 & 25 2018. There is a construction site that has been going on for now 4 years based on what the locals said. This takes away the beautiful structure the Cathedral has on the outside but beside the outside construction the inside is speechless. I can\u2019t wait to come back in another 2 years to enjoy it at it\u2019s fullest.

583093690.name: Beautiful Cathedral!
583093690.author: a TripAdvisor user
583093690.reviewBody: The view is amazing and looks better when it\'s lit up at night. Going inside is also amazing. Here\'s a tip for tourist go behind the altar they have a little showroom where they have the crypts of the Cardinals of Guadalajara.

582247731.name: Gorgeous
582247731.author: a TripAdvisor user
582247731.reviewBody: Peaceful, beautiful architecture, and a must see while in Guadalajara. I am so happy that we went!!!!

579968994.name: Interresting architectural mix
579968994.author: a TripAdvisor user
579968994.reviewBody: It takes time - and someone to explain - about the many different architectural styles one finds in the cathedral. It is interesting to follow the effects of fires, earthquakes etc. that have shaped it.

579561975.name: Amazing grand cathedral
579561975.author: a TripAdvisor user
579561975.reviewBody: The sheer size of this beautiful cathedral is awesome, most other similar churches in the country, save for the Mexico City Cathedral, appear small by comparison.

577655292.name: Hispanic heritage
577655292.author: a TripAdvisor user
577655292.reviewBody: Guadalajara Cathedral is a part of a great architectural ensemble of Plaza de la Liberacion. I was amazed how preserved this place was. The Cathedral of Guadalajara is worth to see it. It\'s very impressive inside with stain glass windows and sophisticated architecture. If you visit Plaza de la Liberacion please don\'t miss the Guadalajara Cathedral!

577249765.name: Beautiful Church
577249765.author: a TripAdvisor user
577249765.reviewBody: It is nice to sit in the plaza close by and have a view of the church. You can watch families play with their children and look at this beautiful church. Worth a visit inside1

576969908.name: A CATHEDRAL BEYOND WORDS!
576969908.author: a TripAdvisor user
576969908.reviewBody: You feel most humbled and blessed as you walk into this massive Cathedral.  The architecture, the statues, the stainglass masterpieces.  It was a place of wonder and spiritual feeling.  Beyond words....

574925244.name: Beautiful
574925244.author: a TripAdvisor user
574925244.reviewBody: We didn\u2019t go inside, but the outside of the cathedral is lovely and the square is too. Loved the modern looking Guadalajara sign in front door in front of the old Cathedral. Makes for a nice photo op!

569891729.name: Beautiful place of worship
569891729.author: a TripAdvisor user
569891729.reviewBody: Gorgeous piece of history to take in and take photos of! Absolutely must see this catedral if you\u2019re in the Centro Hist\u00f3rico

568519671.name: A must see!
568519671.author: a TripAdvisor user
568519671.reviewBody: This grand colonial cathedral and square with its fountains and huge grounds in the center of Guadalajara is like visiting Europe! I strolled around the entire site taking in all the historic areas near this central attraction and was impressed with its beauty.

567999314.name: The tile work on the roof is impressive.
567999314.author: a TripAdvisor user
567999314.reviewBody: This church is quite lovely, but I must admit I found other churches in Guadalajara and the surrounding areas more interesting.  While this one is large, and it\'s tile work unique, the Basilica in Zapopan in a bit more impressive.

567896799.name: Beautiful!
567896799.author: a TripAdvisor user
567896799.reviewBody: Lovely and wonderful, great for all to visit. My wife attended a mass , she\'s been to Mass around the world , said the service and the church are lovey.

565939813.name: Cathedral of Guadalajara
565939813.author: a TripAdvisor user
565939813.reviewBody: Cathedral is located in Central Guadalajara by the main square. Horse and Buggy tours are available outside.

565178316.name: Beautiful church
565178316.author: a TripAdvisor user
565178316.reviewBody: This city is full of old churches. This just happens to be one I visited. The hand made carvings are amazing. This is a must see

565159501.name: Breathtaking
565159501.author: a TripAdvisor user
565159501.reviewBody: This is the Archdiocese in Guadalajara and one of the most beautiful cathedrals I have visited. I have been in many throughout Europe but this is every bit as breathtaking and a must to visit.

564805524.name: Passing through
564805524.author: a TripAdvisor user
564805524.reviewBody: Under renovation. Passed by while at the park for light show set up that was to start in a coupe hours.

564272163.name: Grand building, lovely square
564272163.author: a TripAdvisor user
564272163.reviewBody: We just had a few hours in Guadalajara and visited the cathedral, an very large unusual-shaped building overlooking a beautiful square full of activity. This whole area is full of lovely architecture worth exploring.\nWe\'d like to go back and see more of this lovely city.

564053141.name: Must see
564053141.author: a TripAdvisor user
564053141.reviewBody: Came to visit the cathedral and it is well worth the time! Beautiful interior with lots of stained glass

563434906.name: IMPOSING!
563434906.author: a TripAdvisor user
563434906.reviewBody: Big church, with beautiful architecture.  Built in stone, with beautiful facades on its 4 sides. Its domes and towers are magnificent.  At the interior there are a lot of details to appreciate.  The main altar has beautiful and colorful stained glass windows and golden pieces that enhance its awesomeness.  There are also details in wood and beautiful images. Built in 1600 with a neo-Gothic style.  A recommended visit, it is a beautiful attraction.

562703456.name: Worth stopping to take a look
562703456.author: a TripAdvisor user
562703456.reviewBody: If you\'re in Old Town Guadalajara, this cathedral is most certainly a place worth stopping.  It wasn\'t crowded inside and had lots to see.  We only spent 10-15 minutes there but were very glad we went.

561935737.name: Beautiful cathedral
561935737.author: a TripAdvisor user
561935737.reviewBody: This is a beautiful, well kept cathedral in the center of Guadalajara. The plazas surrounding the church form a cross with the church at its center.

561125406.name: MAGNIFICENT!
561125406.author: a TripAdvisor user
561125406.reviewBody: One of the most magnificent cathedral\'s around, around anywhere! Guadalajara should be proud to have this in their city and I\'m sure they are.

560692398.name: Wow
560692398.author: a TripAdvisor user
560692398.reviewBody: This is one of the largest and most magnificent cathedrals I have seen in Mexico. Beautiful both inside and out. Well worth a visit.

560444560.name: A visit to the Cathedral
560444560.author: a TripAdvisor user
560444560.reviewBody: A very beautiful building with strong Spanish influence. The cathedral is a must see experience for any who pass this way. I am sure that for Catholics it would have a deeper meaning but I still enjoyed it immensely.

559869994.name: Beautiful cathedral
559869994.author: a TripAdvisor user
559869994.reviewBody: This is the poster boy for the city of Guadalajara. It\'s a beautiful cathedral with innate painted glass work inside. The altar is gorgeous. There are many points of interest nearby with loads of restaurants in the area. We visited Guadalajara during christmas 2017 and went back to this cathedral and nearby areas multiple times.

559000383.name: Disappointing...
559000383.author: a TripAdvisor user
559000383.reviewBody: Not sure why people rate this Cathedral so high. It was really disappointing to me to see such a dirty and careless church. Illumination is really poor, may be to hide the lack of maintenance of the building. This is not even close to other cathedrals out there, which are really gorgeous. Don\'t waste your time here.

553052078.name: Awesome
553052078.author: a TripAdvisor user
553052078.reviewBody: This church was clearly designed to impress on the visitor that there is an omnipotent Creator deserving of adoration, and it is not us.

552280410.name: Faith, Architecture, & Art
552280410.author: a TripAdvisor user
552280410.reviewBody: Central Cathedral with plazas on all sides.  Fabulous still active cathedral.  Loaded with historic art with gardens (plazas) on N, S, E, & W forming a cross with the cathedral in the center.

551871221.name: Speechless
551871221.author: a TripAdvisor user
551871221.reviewBody: An amazing temple in the heart of GDL. It is definitely a must visit.  Words can not express the architecture!

551651709.name: Gorgeous church
551651709.author: a TripAdvisor user
551651709.reviewBody: Rich with a treasure of history, this local monument is a great visit. Plan an hour to walk around and sit down and enjoy the splendor

545036544.name: Lovely church
545036544.author: a TripAdvisor user
545036544.reviewBody: Great place to attend mass, after church there\'s lots of neat places around the area to visit and have a great time.

544704848.name: Magnificent
544704848.author: a TripAdvisor user
544704848.reviewBody: Beautiful historic must see. I think construction started in mid 1500\u2019s. Open to the public. A few beggars. It is an active church not a museum. Highly recommend

544668828.name: Lovely area
544668828.author: a TripAdvisor user
544668828.reviewBody: Located in the heart of the city it\'s definitely worth a visit. Lots of other places to see in the main square so take your time.

544666887.name: Beautiful cathedral.
544666887.author: a TripAdvisor user
544666887.reviewBody: Beautiful cathedral.  Stained glass and ornate altar.  We went inside for a period of quiet reflection while visiting the downtown sites in Guadalara.  Light rail construction is underway right outside so be prepared for detours and possible construction noise.

543391283.name: A must see in Guadalajara. Beautiful!
543391283.author: a TripAdvisor user
543391283.reviewBody: This Cathedral is lovely, especially at night. The plaza is very nice as well, although I must say that there are a few homeless people and beggars about. I felt sorry for the woman and her young baby perched at the side of the Cathedral and gave her some Pesos every day that I was in that vicinity.

542162780.name: Beautiful, of course
542162780.author: a TripAdvisor user
542162780.reviewBody: A truly gorgeous church. Definitely was worth seeing, and it\'s got the usual overwhelming amount of artistic glory to enjoy.

541826080.name: lovely church
541826080.author: a TripAdvisor user
541826080.reviewBody: I definitely would put this on my list of things to do, such a lovely old church with many saints situated throughout

541703535.name: Gorgeous
541703535.author: a TripAdvisor user
541703535.reviewBody: A friend gave me a tour of the downtown area and I\u2019m so glad we stopped by to see this! It is a beautiful church building! The inside is gorgeous! It\u2019s definitely worth your time!

539281442.name: Nice visit
539281442.author: a TripAdvisor user
539281442.reviewBody: A aesthetically pleasing church near the university.  The architecture and decor on the outside is really interesting.  The plaza out front is a relaxing place to hang out and watch the world go by.

539101138.name: Well, this is what Guadalajara is known for (visually, at least)
539101138.author: a TripAdvisor user
539101138.reviewBody: Check out the logo in the yellow cabs, its an outline of the cathedral!\nThe building is impressive (even more so inside) but is is its location what makes it really interesting; it marks the start of a nice walk that can take you to most of the main historical buildings in downtown all the way to the Instituto Caba\u00f1as and the San Juan de Dios market (supposedly the biggest one in Latin America), passing by Teatro Degollado, fountains, "tianguis", street performers and food stands. It\'s a nice weekend walk and there are plenty of places to grab a drink or a quick bite. Very safe too!

536995453.name: Beautiful!!
536995453.author: a TripAdvisor user
536995453.reviewBody: Even there\'s some construction outside of the cathedral, you can still admire this beauty, it\'s absolutely beautiful!!

535221704.name: Beautiful!
535221704.author: a TripAdvisor user
535221704.reviewBody: A real jewel. The entire downtown is gorgeous. We went both morning and evening. Really great sightseeing. Take an evening ride in the horse carriage. Super lovely.

534942137.name: Great place
534942137.author: a TripAdvisor user
534942137.reviewBody: Beautiful cathedral in the middle of the city and surrounded of gardens and squares. Worth the quick visit to see the majestic interior.

534900596.name: Beautiful
534900596.author: a TripAdvisor user
534900596.reviewBody: The doors are massive. I have an out of body experience when I walked through them. You have to experience this for yourself...

533885660.name: Visit the Guadalajara Cathedral
533885660.author: a TripAdvisor user
533885660.reviewBody: On your visit to downtown Guadalajara you really should take at least a peek at the Guadalajara Cathedral which is open seven days per week.

533565035.name: Beautiful!
533565035.author: a TripAdvisor user
533565035.reviewBody: Beautiful friendly people with so much sincerity in their traditional worship in this gorgeous building! Worth a visit!

533275350.name: Ok Cathedral
533275350.author: a TripAdvisor user
533275350.reviewBody: It\'s big. Not particularly beautiful decor. Many more beautiful cathedrals in Mexico. Some beggars inside (including scam artist)

533167153.name: Mr Quintana
533167153.author: a TripAdvisor user
533167153.reviewBody: Love this City, warm people and so much to do, will be visiting with friends and family again in December

532921903.name: Nice monument.
532921903.author: a TripAdvisor user
532921903.reviewBody: Nice monument.The inside view is excellent but outside view is not that great. The taxis can go upto the cathedral and the area is safe and you can very well spend a good time. But I did not see many visitors here.

532797721.name: A beautiful church
532797721.author: a TripAdvisor user
532797721.reviewBody: A must see if you are visiting the area. This place is huge. There are lovely works of art and huge chandeliers hanging from the ceilings.

532615033.name: Beautiful church in a beautiful place
532615033.author: a TripAdvisor user
532615033.reviewBody: The building is gorgeous, so much detail and care is obvious at every inch; it\'s a very peaceful welcoming holy space.  I have visited many times continue to look forward to future visits.

532129947.name: huge cathedral ,,,,,, typically Spanish
532129947.author: a TripAdvisor user
532129947.reviewBody: I\'m not really into Spanish cathedrals but this one is as grand as the one in Mexico city .....if you\'re into this sort of thing , this is one to not miss

531822515.name: Exquisite!
531822515.author: a TripAdvisor user
531822515.reviewBody: This is an amazing cathedral to see. Words can\'t describe the wonder and power you feel when you enter. You feel like you have arrived in heaven. As a Catholic I was able to appreciate it more than my husband. Mass was going on as we entered and feeling it gives you is just amazing. A must see!

529276807.name: The most important catholic church in Guadalajara
529276807.author: a TripAdvisor user
529276807.reviewBody: This is a cathedral in the center of the city, important because it was constructed during the colonial period and is well maintained. There is a earlu XX century large pipe organ.

529122029.name: Make sure to visit the crypt
529122029.author: a TripAdvisor user
529122029.reviewBody: The staircase down is not completely obvious, as most visitors don\u2019t seem to go down.  But it is worth a visit to see the resting places of prior cardinals. \n\nDon\u2019t forget to donate to the upkeep of the church.

528601787.name: Absolutely beautiful!!
528601787.author: a TripAdvisor user
528601787.reviewBody: Beautiful cathedral with the style of the others in the city, with its own unique look and larger size!  Must visit and great area!

528395253.name: Peaceful
528395253.author: a TripAdvisor user
528395253.reviewBody: We like going inside churches not only for religious purposes but we appreciate the way different eras influenced the baroque and renaissance architecture.

526251126.name: Beautiful inside and out
526251126.author: a TripAdvisor user
526251126.reviewBody: Beautiful building, lovely interior and the ceiling is stunning. It\'s an open cathedral and there were many people coming to do their confessions which is something I haven\'t seen before.

525818236.name: A must see in El Centro
525818236.author: a TripAdvisor user
525818236.reviewBody: All visitors to Guadalajara need to see this cathedral. It is old, classic, massive and rich Catholic Church.

525074265.name: Great historical place
525074265.author: a TripAdvisor user
525074265.reviewBody: If you visit Guadalajara then is a must to come here and take a look around! The details are great and everything that it surrounded is worth to see

524755835.name: Emotional
524755835.author: a TripAdvisor user
524755835.reviewBody: It\'s a beautiful old church with so much history. Right in the center of the historic area of the city.

523448242.name: Inspiring architecture
523448242.author: a TripAdvisor user
523448242.reviewBody: This is a functioning church, so be mindful of others while they worship. When we arrived the area outside the church was under construction so try to walk to the site. It is named: "Catedral bas\u00edlica de la Asunci\u00f3n de Mar\u00eda Sant\u00edsima." Considered a historic monument, a must see if you visit this city. As you enter you can experience a calm and seren inviroment vs outside world. The architecture is inspiring and every nook has something to observe.

522397157.name: Good Place for a Sunday Walk
522397157.author: a TripAdvisor user
522397157.reviewBody: A lot of people out on a sunny Sunday.  I enjoyed the square even with all the construction.  People were nice and their is la chata restaurant in walking distance.  I had a nice time there and would go back to see more.

520927598.name: Magnificent Edifice
520927598.author: a TripAdvisor user
520927598.reviewBody: Breath taking art detail throughout the interior of the church. You can experience the peaceful serenity as you take in the magnificent color and art form. Never expected to find so many similarities with European shrines.

520537250.name: Magnifico
520537250.author: a TripAdvisor user
520537250.reviewBody: Visited the Cathedral several times to enjoy and study the art and architecture. We attended mass and this was a wonderful experience.Do some research before visiting.

520106041.name: Site seeing
520106041.author: a TripAdvisor user
520106041.reviewBody: The structure is very old and beautiful. The surrounding area outside is to just sit down and relax if you want.

517828805.name: BEAUTIFUL!!
517828805.author: a TripAdvisor user
517828805.reviewBody: It\'s a BEAUTIFUL Cathedral!\nIt a very antique Church with lots of architectural details. Everything is plain ORIGINAL,Everyone still following the Catholic traditions from before.  It\'s just a very unique place to visit.  It the same block you have many other places you can visit , they have restaurants shops you can buy lots of souvenirs.

515283464.name: Perfect Cathedral
515283464.author: a TripAdvisor user
515283464.reviewBody: Absolute stunning. Not on the grand scale of Europe but quintessential architecture. One of the must see places in this interesting and fun city.

513712242.name: very nice
513712242.author: a TripAdvisor user
513712242.reviewBody: very nice and big cathedral.\nin an nice place with a lot other things to see and visit.\na must place in guadalajara

512981754.name: Vacationing in Guadalajara 2017
512981754.author: a TripAdvisor user
512981754.reviewBody: Visited Guadalajara for a several day vacation! It looks great. The cathedral is beautiful. There is a bit of improvement going on. Yet, not bad. It\'s a beautiful city with lots of places to visit. Our family decided to hire a Taxi to take us to the most important and beautiful touristic sites the city offers. it was affordable and Best idea ever!

512891097.name: The center of history
512891097.author: a TripAdvisor user
512891097.reviewBody: This cathedral emits a profound energy of faith.  It is a special and very old place and a visit to it and the surrounding plaza is a tourist must.  Lots of surrounding museums.  Early evenings the area is filled with people enjoying the warm evening, the street acts and nearby coffee shops

511085127.name: Beautiful Cathedral
511085127.author: a TripAdvisor user
511085127.reviewBody: I like to visit on Sunday\'s when from 6am - 2pm Luis Vallarta Avenue is closed to vehicles from Glorieta Minerva to downtown. This allows you to leisurely stroll down Vallarta and see all the sights including this magnificent cathedral.

510755515.name: An important history of The Catholic Church in Mexico
510755515.author: a TripAdvisor user
510755515.reviewBody: A beautiful church, rich with Mexico\'s past within the country of Mexico.  It can be seen with a tour of Guadalajara\'s downtown district.  A must see if you visit Guadalajara.

510698140.name: Seeing GDL
510698140.author: a TripAdvisor user
510698140.reviewBody: Great cathedral! Well worth seeing if you come to Guadalajara at any time. It truly portrays Guadalajara history and conviction.

510305333.name: Marvelous place!
510305333.author: a TripAdvisor user
510305333.reviewBody: The Guadalajara Cathedral is a must on your list of places to visit when in Guadalajara! There\'s a glass coffin with the actual body of Santa Inocencia, and her story brings you to tears! Watching her is quite an experience and watching the locals enter the Cathedral on their knees, paying their respects, makes you love such a beautiful culture even more!

505926295.name: Standing in Defiance in Fire & Earthquakes
505926295.author: a TripAdvisor user
505926295.reviewBody:
Guadalajara Cathedral, or Cathedral of the Assumption of Our Lady, is a Catholic religious monument which began in 1541 as a primitive church of adobe with a thatched roof. Fire destroyed it in 1574. King Felipe ll  rebuilt it in 1561 and it was totally completed in 1716, only to be ruined by an earthquake in 1818. The towers and dome collapsed when the whole city shook in that year. 

1849 saw another earthquake damage the church and a rebuilding by 1854. Subsequent earthquakes were factors in 1932, 1957, 1979, 1985, 1995 and 2003. The Cathedral is in danger today of collapse.

With that in mind, enjoy the minor basilica now with its historic Spanish Renaissance style and Neo Gothic towers.  It houses important relics and crypts of famous Catholics. Its beauty and history is like none other.

503614812.name: A beautiful Cathedral
503614812.author: a TripAdvisor user
503614812.reviewBody: It\'s amazing how the build it, it\'s huge and the Jaliciense are very catholic people, and even if you are not a catholic it is a good place to visit

501456599.name: Beautiful Cathedral
501456599.author: a TripAdvisor user
501456599.reviewBody: Loved all the mosaic tile and the duomos. The choir and organ were beautiful at Mass. There is a chapel and the mains cathedral and also a museum. We didn\'t get to visit the museum but Mass was beautiful!

498683367.name: The cities main cathedraele
498683367.author: a TripAdvisor user
498683367.reviewBody: The cathedral is the center point of the city, and was preparing for a large festival. Mass was therefore heavily attended.

497798380.name: Beautiful
497798380.author: a TripAdvisor user
497798380.reviewBody: Visiting downtown guadalajara is a must. The cathedral was amazing. It\'s a wonderful church and connected to nearby parks and other sights. Parking downtown was easy and we enjoyed the experience.

496672314.name: Beautiful sighting!
496672314.author: a TripAdvisor user
496672314.reviewBody: Located in the middle of the city, this Cathedral is a must-see for tourists, not only for how breathtaking this church is, but also for all the activity going around it, including street art/musician/food, etc. Very safr area too.

494109618.name: Impressive cathedral with lots of activity and displays
494109618.author: a TripAdvisor user
494109618.reviewBody: This was the best cathedral for us. The services are nice and peaceful and the people (even the tourists) seem very polite and respectful. You might even want to provide some small change to the beggars sitting outside the place.  Several displays of saints are inside and offer you ample opportunity to pay your respects and even enjoy the artwork. Just don\'t take pictures like the tourists that you see in here; it\'s annoying and quite rude!

491348965.name: Just Beautiful
491348965.author: a TripAdvisor user
491348965.reviewBody: Loved the Location of this Cathedral ! It got lots of beautiful surrounding churches and Cathedrals also! I bought many little souvenirs ,bracelets and pictures blessed by the church in the little shops outside. \nA must see in Guadalajara!

489362764.name: Beautiful Open Air  Cathedral
489362764.author: a TripAdvisor user
489362764.reviewBody: I am a sucker for a beautiful Cathedral and have seen them all over the world. This one is just as beautiful as ones Ive seen in Europe. It is well maintained and very clean.

487821861.name: Visited downtown and took pics with the historical architecture!
487821861.author: a TripAdvisor user
487821861.reviewBody: Highly recommend as a Must do, even if it\'s for a walk and ice cream! There is so much to do in the plaza!

483567557.name: Nice cathedral
483567557.author: a TripAdvisor user
483567557.reviewBody: It looks so huge from the outside and different from each direction. Good for taking pictures but difficult to capture the entire cathedral in a single shot. Inside, the cathedral looks pretty much like a normal cathedral. One interesting thing to look out for would be the preserved saint inside.

480549432.name: Looks similar to most cathedrals
480549432.author: a TripAdvisor user
480549432.reviewBody: I\'ve been to various famous churches and cathedrals across the world and this one is very similar to most of them but then it has its own charm and looks great. Worth a visit.

479333956.name: Beautiful Cathedral, must see in Guadalajara
479333956.author: a TripAdvisor user
479333956.reviewBody: In Guadalajara, this cathedral is the must see, amazing architecture and grand building leaves you mesmerizing.

476818697.name: Beautiful Cathedral!
476818697.author: a TripAdvisor user
476818697.reviewBody: An absolutely beautiful Cathedral, even the side altars were built with such attention to detail. We sat at the back of the church for quite a while just admiring the architecture. Lots of street vendors selling food and juices surround the Cathedral and there are also many other amazing historical buildings in the area. Highly recommend taking one of the horse and carriage rides around the city that are often outside/around the Cathedral, it\'s a great way to get your bearings and our driver was full of good knowledge. It was 300 pesos for an hour or 200 for half an hour but we went for an hour and thought it was a perfect amount of time. Enjoy!

476128913.name: Simply Amazing
476128913.author: a TripAdvisor user
476128913.reviewBody: You must go inside to witness this church!!  The architecture defies the imagination. Simply beautiful. The plaza surrounding has many shops and eateries!

474952443.name: Wonderful memories...
474952443.author: a TripAdvisor user
474952443.reviewBody:
I have not been back to Guadalajara since 2007. I just wanted to finish the review off as I remember it like it was yesterday!
I lived in Gdl 1999-2000: my year abroad from University in the UK and I got to teach at the ENS de Jalisco for the year - it was truly the life-changing year of my life. I learned so much and gained so much; I honestly feel I was Mexican in a past life.
I visited the cathedral almost every week as it was just a beautiful place to go - I liked buying the little trinkets from those outside trying to make a living. I was always intrigued by the constant stream of visitors to the little saint in there, too - she was there as a symbol of strength for remaining loyal to her catholic faith. Mexicans posted photos of their little ones and flowers, requesting her help when needed.
Nobody should miss out visiting this beautiful place when in this lovely city.
Thank you, Gdl for the memories...

474783090.name: See the cathedral when downtown
474783090.author: a TripAdvisor user
474783090.reviewBody: The Guadalajara Cathedral is one of those local landmarks one should see when visiting the downtown area. It\'s a lovely cathedral, not the most beautiful one in the world, but still worth a short visit.

474636069.name: Beatiful Cathedral! Classic and conservative
474636069.author: a TripAdvisor user
474636069.reviewBody: A good representation of the Catholics Churches for a city like Guadalajara. Well kept and spacious for the congregation

473217928.name: Beautiful Cathedral
473217928.author: a TripAdvisor user
473217928.reviewBody: We booked a City Tour and our guide took us all over this beautiful city.  We witnessed the 2 bell ringers (and took a movie)  just before 12 Mass on Sunday, where the Cardinal was attending. Great to see actual bell ringers and not the "recorded variety".  We came back on our own later in the week to visit the Cathedral. It\'s a don\'t miss when in Guadalajara.

473006593.name: Cathedral of The Assumption of Our Lady
473006593.author: a TripAdvisor user
473006593.reviewBody: The Guadalajara Cathedral (with a minor basilica in the back) is located in Historic Downtown Guadalajara, and it was built on 1541 with neo-gothic bell towers. The Cathedral has relics (incorruptibles) of Saint Innocent as well as the remains of three cardinals and several other former bishops of the diocese,

472725737.name: Very Beautiful Church
472725737.author: a TripAdvisor user
472725737.reviewBody: I attended the Sunday mass at the Cathedral and it is really great to be in such a historical place. The building is fantastic and the architecture is awesome.

471501853.name: A beautiful walk
471501853.author: a TripAdvisor user
471501853.reviewBody: A colorful walk to the cathedral. You will have an opportunity to purchase many souvenirs or clothing as you make your way to cathedral. You also will have an opportunity to find some excellent restaurants.

470569097.name: Very historic
470569097.author: a TripAdvisor user
470569097.reviewBody: The cathedral is very beautiful to visit.   You can go in and walk around.   Very touristy.  You can walk to the back and see steps leading down to see burials.

470120894.name: Spiritual Visit
470120894.author: a TripAdvisor user
470120894.reviewBody: 2nd time visiting this church, which is actually 2 church\'s in one. Very moving experience as we visited during Lent with the Stations Of The Cross being said. Beautiful and huge cathedral. Gift shop was closed (limited hours)  but lots of vendors outside. Good place to rest and gather your thoughts during a visit to the historic part of Guadalajara.

469213991.name: An Absolute Must See!
469213991.author: a TripAdvisor user
469213991.reviewBody: The Guadalajara cathedral is an impressive cathedral in the center of Guadalajara! Absolutely beautiful and breathtakingly beautiful! A must see when visiting the city!

468340101.name: Guadalajara Cathedral
468340101.author: a TripAdvisor user
468340101.reviewBody: The cathedral is beautiful from almost every angle (inside and out), and strolling the surrounding plazas and grounds were a highlight of our stay In Guadalajara.

464720060.name: Impressive Cathedral esp when lite at night
464720060.author: a TripAdvisor user
464720060.reviewBody: From our hotel window and its restaurant on top we had an excellent view of this landmark.  Like many cat very ornate inside

464620372.name: Wonderous!
464620372.author: a TripAdvisor user
464620372.reviewBody: This is a historical cathedral that rivals those of Europe. It is easily accessed and is surrounded by other cultural buildings and areas for tourists to explore.

464453541.name: Mejestic cathedral
464453541.author: a TripAdvisor user
464453541.reviewBody:
The cathedral area in Guadalajara is extremely beautiful and highly recommended for a visit on a Saturday evening. It is very nicely lit up and looks beautiful. The surroundings have more beautiful historical buildings and open air cafes.

During November and Christmas time there are lots of fairs and beautiful celebrations behind the cathedral and the entire area is lit up beautifully.

I would highly recommend you to visit in the months of December as that is when the place looks extremely beautiful.

463077411.name: Pretty church.   Not the Vatican, but must see in GDL
463077411.author: a TripAdvisor user
463077411.reviewBody: It is a pretty church.    Essentially the center of the downtown historical area.     Good to walk around the square.    Free to enter.

462795855.name: Beautiful
462795855.author: a TripAdvisor user
462795855.reviewBody: The cathedral is stunning both inside and out.  The architecture of the church and buildings throughout the plaza are great to check out during a walk.

462024605.name: BEAUTIFUL
462024605.author: a TripAdvisor user
462024605.reviewBody: It is a beautiful place and is surround by different plazas where people gather to hangout and enjoy an ice cream or such. The plazas also have free WiFi.

460969468.name: Center of celebration
460969468.author: a TripAdvisor user
460969468.reviewBody: How wonderful to have at the center of a city\'s celebration, their cathedral.    At the 475th anniversary celebration for the city of Guadalajara, they had a light show in the face of the cathedral.  It was incredible. And then showed fireworks around it.   What a highlight and so beautiful to have this church lit up.

460784346.name: Beautiful
460784346.author: a TripAdvisor user
460784346.reviewBody: The cathedral of Guadalajara is a beautiful church. It is well known throughout Mexico. People come from all over the country to visit it. There is much history associated with it.

460544226.name: Beautiful historical
460544226.author: a TripAdvisor user
460544226.reviewBody: A must in guadalajara.   Beautiful archeture inside and out.  The domo is fantastic and you can see the defining towers throughout the city.  A myst see.

460446196.name: Majestic !
460446196.author: a TripAdvisor user
460446196.reviewBody: Its a huge and very old Cathedral... right in the middle of Guadalajara. Must visit for travelers !!

459276455.name: Beautiful Church
459276455.author: a TripAdvisor user
459276455.reviewBody: They\'re doing construction out the front which makes it so you can no longer walk all the way around the building. Inside it is very nice and it is typical of a latin american cathedral. It is most definitely worth spending a few minutes to explore on a downtown GDL visit.

458993777.name: beautiful church
458993777.author: a TripAdvisor user
458993777.reviewBody: Beautiful church in the center of the city a must see! Awe inspiring images and architecture. A must see attraction.

458411880.name: wonderful iglesia en centro Guadalajara
458411880.author: a TripAdvisor user
458411880.reviewBody: Great beautiful Cathedral in centro Guadalajara.  wonderful stained glass, well worth the visit.  great town and area.  stayed at Hotle Morales, just a few blocks walk away.  loved it all

458408371.name: a must see
458408371.author: a TripAdvisor user
458408371.reviewBody: The Cathedrals in all of Mexico are astonishing. A must see in all the big cities. The decor inside these churches are truly awe/inspiring and the architectural designs are breath taking

457947095.name: Don\'t miss
457947095.author: a TripAdvisor user
457947095.reviewBody:
When you see this architectural marvel
You will wonder how they ever were able to build it.
     Your eyes continually drift upwards at the ceiling.
    Even if you aren't a Christian I think you would enjoy it's beauty.
     There was no fee either.

457469965.name: Arrived during mass
457469965.author: a TripAdvisor user
457469965.reviewBody: Lucky Us!  We planned a visit to the Cathedral and arrived during Mass. spend some time here enjoying some beautiful religious art.  There was lots of construction at the entrance, but it did not affect our visit.

455522599.name: To touch history
455522599.author: a TripAdvisor user
455522599.reviewBody: There is a tremendous sense of history and tradition and faith. It put our lives into a new perspective.

455100191.name: Beautiful old cathedral
455100191.author: a TripAdvisor user
455100191.reviewBody: The cathedral is located in Downtown Guadalajara, surrounded by beautiful historical buildings. Beautiful, inside and out. Great place with lots of history. Must visit.

454836635.name: Beautiful Old World Cathedral
454836635.author: a TripAdvisor user
454836635.reviewBody: We had a delightful afternoon visiting the Cathedral!  It seemed like we had been guided to have a nice visit before the Cathedral closed at 1pm. Next we went to a religious goods shop operated by The Sisters of The Divine Master just a block away before they closed at 2pm!!  The Cathedral is exquisite, and unadorned in any gold that I saw!  A mural of the Blessed Mother, Queen of Heaven and Earth, with God, The Father, Son, and Holy Spirit was above the main altar.  A picture of Our Lady of Guadalupe in San Juan Diego\'s cloak was on the left and a composite picture of the blessed lay Mexican martyrs was on the right; both catching my eye and heart.  You need to see this historical masterpiece which is unassuming in its quiet splendor!  One of the most beautiful world Cathedrals I\'ve seen!

453913969.name: Most Iconic City\'s Landmark
453913969.author: a TripAdvisor user
453913969.reviewBody: As with many Colonial towns, the most iconic landmark is the town\'s cathedral. Guadalajara\'s is not the exception. Its architecture is unique and different from other Mexico\'s cathedrals. It\'s surrounded by other iconic landmarks that are apart by just short distances so one has the chance to visit few of them in just one visit. \nHowever, the Cathedral itself is just worth visiting and admiring its beauty. Don\'t miss it!

453200787.name: wonderful
453200787.author: a TripAdvisor user
453200787.reviewBody: Very old church,,,very nice subject to photograph...textures everywhere, old  for sure,,inside is so quiet many paintings and statues very well preserved love it

451595049.name: Absolutely Gorgeous
451595049.author: a TripAdvisor user
451595049.reviewBody: I\'ve seen some fine cathedrals in many countries in my day, but this one has to be one of the most impressive. It\'s probably best to visit it when there is no mass or other event happening because you\'ll want to take your time to walk around freely to view and inspect all that it has to offer.

451096018.name: Incredible architecture
451096018.author: a TripAdvisor user
451096018.reviewBody: Guadalajara cultural centre is just beautiful. During 30 minutes walk you can see so many stunning buildings. Magnificent. Do not miss this!\nCathedral was amazing, inside was even more breathtaking.

449675260.name: Beautiful
449675260.author: a TripAdvisor user
449675260.reviewBody:
We were there for a quick visit. The Cathedral is beautiful. Many details everywhere. 

Also small rooms to pray privately.

449636920.name: Mi Catedral!
449636920.author: a TripAdvisor user
449636920.reviewBody: Ok, I am prejudiced....but this is the best looking church in all of Mexico.  We even have mummified remains and local Indians selling their crafts on the steps.  What more could you want?  The Cathedral opens onto 4 different Plazas, all equally beautiful.  This is a great place for pictures, but do not disturb during mass.  PLEASE do not wear shorts and miniskirts, as this disturbs the sensibility of the worshippers.

449301285.name: Nice old world building
449301285.author: a TripAdvisor user
449301285.reviewBody: It is one on of the major attraction of Guadalajara. A nice building with lots of old word charm and a pleasant Plaza with fountains in front.

449057013.name: Beautiful cathedral
449057013.author: a TripAdvisor user
449057013.reviewBody: This is the grand dame of Guadalajara. Beautiful from both the outside and inside. Ceilings are impressive

447192106.name: History and culture
447192106.author: a TripAdvisor user
447192106.reviewBody: I do the care what faith you are this is a must see in the square in central Guadalajara.They are working o. The outside so some scafo!Ding is around a tower. But touring the Ii side is a must. You  don\'t have to be a religious person to enjoy the artictiture. I\'ve gone be just people watched and are lunch just looking at the church

446920721.name: An inspiring visit that will calm your spirit!
446920721.author: a TripAdvisor user
446920721.reviewBody: The Cathedral in Centro is magnificent and very well maintained.  There is a constant flow of worshippers who come in to reflect and pray.  It is a most solemn and worthwhile place to visit.

446197330.name: Breath taking
446197330.author: a TripAdvisor user
446197330.reviewBody: This was breath taking. Visit earlier in the day to skip the crowds. Despite the construction we still had an amazing view, only the side entrance was open for access.

445924271.name: Pry the Lord and keep your eyes on the floor
445924271.author: a TripAdvisor user
445924271.reviewBody: Thie magnifient church shows both sides of catholic faith, the people who belives in God and the good priest who fought agianst the evil, but it shows in a monstrocity level, the corruption and the opulence of this place, beggars are outside, so low life thiefs too, so keep your eyes on you belonging all the time

443213184.name: Weekend get away
443213184.author: a TripAdvisor user
443213184.reviewBody: Inspiring.. ardavan area code Exquisite historical venues. All located within easy walking distance of one another.

442756170.name: Beautiful building
442756170.author: a TripAdvisor user
442756170.reviewBody: We walked by the Cathedral many times.  Loved looking at the architecture from different sides of the building.   Went inside once.  Services were going on but we were able to look up into the dome.

442289072.name: A must see.....
442289072.author: a TripAdvisor user
442289072.reviewBody: You need about a hour or two to take some amazing pictures.  Its historic, old, and has a sense of spirit no matter what religious beliefs you hold or not.

441558873.name: Beautiful church in the middle of beautiful Central area
441558873.author: a TripAdvisor user
441558873.reviewBody: This is a beautiful church to come and see.  There is no admission at all.  There is some construction around the building but during the week there was\'n\'t many people in the church.   Definitely worth a visit to the church and the area.

441371886.name: Beautiful cathedral
441371886.author: a TripAdvisor user
441371886.reviewBody: Beautiful, inside and out. Unique cathedral. There were renovations occurring while we were there, but it was still a great visit.

440686615.name: Wonderful Historic Building
440686615.author: a TripAdvisor user
440686615.reviewBody: Amazing building standing after over 100 years. The surrounding area is well preserved and equally amazing.

439772764.name: Extraordinary!
439772764.author: a TripAdvisor user
439772764.reviewBody: Some traffic congestion due to construction over the next year, but very beautiful. Soaring columns and Baroque decorating is well worth seeing.

438173403.name: Always crowded !
438173403.author: a TripAdvisor user
438173403.reviewBody: This is a very-nice! It has been re-built several times in history. It used to have another roof. Theres many sculptures inside.

437836523.name: A must see !!
437836523.author: a TripAdvisor user
437836523.reviewBody: The cathedral is located at Guadalajara\'s downtown, surrounded by beautiful historical buildings. It is an amazing building from the XVI century, although it is possible to see the many changes it had after the destruction of some parts due to earthquakes and fires. Besides the main altar, It has a lot of other smaller altars inside it, what makes it particularly interesting to visit.

437205193.name: Very Pleasant Square
437205193.author: a TripAdvisor user
437205193.reviewBody: The cathedral is beautiful and we happened to visit during mass. Very touching. The square surrounding the cathedral is great for strolling and enjoying the surroundings. The people of Guadalajara are very nice and the local culture is really felt.

436718324.name: Beautiful Cathedral
436718324.author: a TripAdvisor user
436718324.reviewBody: The construction of the Guadalajara Cathedral was finished in the 1540s.  Since then it has needed work because of earthquakes that hit the Guadalajara area.  Its beautiful inside and out.  It has the gothic bell towers.  The day I visited there was construction going on in the area.  So i had to be careful walking outside.  A lot of holes in the sidewalk area so use caution so you dont hurt yourself.  I recommend taking a photo early in the morning for the best view.

435940300.name: BREATHTAKING
435940300.author: a TripAdvisor user
435940300.reviewBody: Such an emotional and surreal experience. the art, architecture, preservation....its just stunning. Definitely a humbling experience.

433814749.name: Beautiful place, but can be very crowded
433814749.author: a TripAdvisor user
433814749.reviewBody: This place is great for picture and sight seeing. Note that there are a lot of people here as this is a popular destination. You can easily spend 2 hrs walking around here and checking out historic landmarks. Try coming here around 7pm when the sun is setting for best photos and views.

431441798.name: Stunning to visit
431441798.author: a TripAdvisor user
431441798.reviewBody: Remember as with all churches, they will be having services so you need to be respectful. There are some wonderful side chapels with stories connected to the fight for independence, the chapel dedicated to the priests and families who hid them during the conflict between the government and the church is very moving.

431198621.name: I want To Give It A 4.5
431198621.author: a TripAdvisor user
431198621.reviewBody:
Okay - very time I see a cathedral like this, I wonder if the money would have been better spent on a hospital for poor people. Ego, ego, ego. But to be fair - ego has given us some outstanding architecture. 

Internally, this cathedral comes with all the trappings of mysticism and iconography that annoyed Moses so much he broke the tablets. It also has the corpse of a dead girl called Innocentia ( or something like that ) with a fable that her Dad killed her for taking first communion. A decent Christian burial should have been in order, instead of now being a photo opportunity for the superstitious, and cynics, like me. 

The cathedral is well worth a look though.

430856186.name: Nice
430856186.author: a TripAdvisor user
430856186.reviewBody: Very nice and interesting objective... Worth seeing. Big and imposing structure in the center of the city. Nice sorrounding. Entire center is great.

430455134.name: Beautiful Historic Catholic Church
430455134.author: a TripAdvisor user
430455134.reviewBody: We were fortunate to walk into this huge historic church during a traditional Mexican (boda) wedding. This is a 17th century grand church built by the Spaniards\'.

430086250.name: Historical downtown beauty a must see...
430086250.author: a TripAdvisor user
430086250.reviewBody: Wow... enjoy historical buildings and churches whenever traveling.  ...and this one is at the top of the list for Mexico.  It was a first time visit to Guadalajara, so we stayed in downtown and were able to walk everywhere.

429411359.name: Icon from the City
429411359.author: a TripAdvisor user
429411359.reviewBody: Cathedral is an icon of the city that any tourist should visit. It has more than 300 years and it has four parks in each side which when seen from high made a cross where Cathedral is in the middle. Lot of sight seeing nearby.

428163083.name: History and faith
428163083.author: a TripAdvisor user
428163083.reviewBody: Quite and peacefull place for praying. This Cathedral has a great srt collection, take your time to visit and enjoy every piece of art.

425895927.name: Renovation
425895927.author: a TripAdvisor user
425895927.reviewBody: We visited during a period of renovation. Unfortunate because the outside looked promising. Insite is very well maintained andvdecorated. It is however, just another cathedral.:)

420584882.name: A beautiful church
420584882.author: a TripAdvisor user
420584882.reviewBody: This is in central Guadalajara and it was built in the 1500\'s.  It is beautiful and open all day.  There were many people wandering in and out when we were there.  This is not to be missed.

414777869.name: Impresive
414777869.author: a TripAdvisor user
414777869.reviewBody: You must visit this cathedral. To see it up close you are left overwhelmed by just the size itself. I also had the chance to attend a mass at a nearby church on Morelos avenue just a few blocks up where children (think from a nearby catholic school)were attending. I think it is one of the nicest masses I have attended. \nAlso the plazas infront and on the side of the cathedral are quite beautiful. You can enjoy a meal, beer, coffee etc in the nearby restaurants situated right on the main plaza

413735484.name: Love it!
413735484.author: a TripAdvisor user
413735484.reviewBody: This is for sure one of my favorite cathedrals, every time I come to Guadalajara I have to stop by. I love the architecture, the area, it\'s just so beautiful.

412491521.name: Beautiful spanish square
412491521.author: a TripAdvisor user
412491521.reviewBody: Part of the central spanish square of Guadalajara, this large format square is beautiful in character and architecture.

409074179.name: Beautiful!
409074179.author: a TripAdvisor user
409074179.reviewBody: If you\'re in Guadalajara, it\'s unlikely that you\'ll miss the cathedral. It\'s visually stunning from the outside and original in its design. I\'ve seen a lot of cathedrals and churches since being in Mexico and it\'s refreshing to see something a little different. It\'s also beautiful on the inside so make sure to go in. Unfortunately, the area in front is under construction at the moment and obscures the view, but you\'ll still be able to appreciate it.

408077209.name: Beautiful Church
408077209.author: a TripAdvisor user
408077209.reviewBody: The church is very beautiful on the outside and the inside. It looks huge on the outside. Once inside, I expected it to be bigger. I guess I am just used to seeing the churches on the Iberian peninsula. Nonetheless, it is still worth the visit to this historic church.

407632491.name: Magnificent 400 year old Cathedral
407632491.author: a TripAdvisor user
407632491.reviewBody: A wonderful building full of the details you would expect in a classical colonial building The history is broad and worth a visit

407347832.name: GDL must see
407347832.author: a TripAdvisor user
407347832.reviewBody: ITs really impressive on the inside when the construction isnt taking place.  Its worth seeing it, but not as attractive right now with the earth movers

407347230.name: The pride of GDL
407347230.author: a TripAdvisor user
407347230.reviewBody: You cant go to Guadalajara and not see the cathedral.  Its their main tourist attraction.  Watch out for the street construction in front....it really makes traffic a pain and detracts from its photo esthetics.  You can go in for free but church etiquette is expected

403856368.name: Breath Taking
403856368.author: a TripAdvisor user
403856368.reviewBody: Truly a majestic place to visit. A must see if visiting Guadalajara. The architecture is amazing & the inside is basking in beauty. Gorgeous statues throughout. Can\'t wait till my next visit just to come here again.

403811556.name: great cathedral but NOT NOW!!! CONSTRUCTION EVERYWHERE
403811556.author: a TripAdvisor user
403811556.reviewBody: Just went downtown yesterday (august 9th,2016) and the whole road in front of the cathedral is ripped up. They are making room for the third line of our fast rail (tren ligero linea 3) and it will not be completely done for a couple more years. I am not sure how much longer in front of the cathedral - but it looks like quite a while! so you will not be able to get a great shot from the front. You can still go in, but on the side entrances only. I will post some pictures.

403068274.name: Beautiful and historical
403068274.author: a TripAdvisor user
403068274.reviewBody: You will see how mexicans visit and pray, while it offers historical details about Spanish colonists\' arrival in the area.

398067682.name: A gorgeous Cathedral!
398067682.author: a TripAdvisor user
398067682.reviewBody: What a beautiful place this is!  Whether you are Catholic or not, you can appreciate the marvelous architecture from yesteryear.   This church is well maintained by the faithful, with so many fresh flowers!  A feast for your eyes and soul!

397494648.name: Guadalajara main cathedral
397494648.author: a TripAdvisor user
397494648.reviewBody: Just like cathedral in Mexico City, Guadalajara cathedral is also large in size and still active in use. Inside the cathedral is kept clean and well maintained. When we visited, the outer is still being renovated, but it\'s still marvelous church.

394828174.name: Magnificent
394828174.author: a TripAdvisor user
394828174.reviewBody: One of the most beautiful catedrals I have been in. A MUST SEE. Simply magnificent. I thought I was in Rome.

394133416.name: Beautiful
394133416.author: a TripAdvisor user
394133416.reviewBody: Very nice and accessible to all, large, in the heart of downtown.  Great location, they are building public transport in the area when be visited but still accessible

392987985.name: Nice Church Beware of Thefts!!!
392987985.author: a TripAdvisor user
392987985.reviewBody: Church is beautiful, however thefts are a big problem we got our camera backpack with 2 cameras and a cell phone stolen right from our bench. Please make sure you don\'t carry any valuables with you and keep an eye on anyone close to you it took a blink for us to get our stuff taken!!

391898362.name: Beautiful
391898362.author: a TripAdvisor user
391898362.reviewBody: Amazing place beautiful architecture and the way they are trying to preserve it it\'s amazing.  So many details and style.  Unfortunately it was raining the day o visited so it was a really short visit since it was a walking tour.

389481935.name: Amazing! !
389481935.author: a TripAdvisor user
389481935.reviewBody: We visited when they where doing a construction in the front street, only inconvenience, but nothing inside, this is one of the most beautiful church I ever seen,all the details are amazing, it\'s an very colonial and old cathedral, capture the essence of Guadalajara a must see!

389241784.name: Great +300 year old Catholic Cathedral to visit
389241784.author: a TripAdvisor user
